mapper.select: select i.out_put_id, i.ent_code, e.ent_name, i.out_put_code, i.out_put_name, i.out_put_type, i.out_put_status, i.longitude, i.latitude, i.out_put_height, i.out_put_position, i.mn_num, i.trans_rate, i.valid_rate, i.create_user, i.create_time, i.update_user, i.update_time, i.remark, i.pollutant_code from t_ent_out_put_info i left join t_bas_enterprise e on e.ent_code = i.ent_code where i.out_put_id = #{outPutId}
mapper.insert:

out_put_id, ent_code, out_put_code, out_put_name, out_put_type, out_put_status, longitude, latitude, out_put_height, out_put_position, mn_num, trans_rate, valid_rate, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, pollutant_code,
